en.name: Whiteblind
en.passiveDescription: On hit, Normal or Charged Attacks increase ATK and DEF by {{6%//7.5%//9%//10.5%//12%}} for 6s. Max 4 stacks. This effect can only occur once every 0.5s.

zh.name: 白影剑
zh.passiveDescription: 普通攻击和重击命中后，攻击力和防御力提高{{6%//7.5%//9%//10.5%//12%}}。该效果持续6秒，最多叠加4层，每0.5秒只能触发一次。
